senses.sense_definition: A resort city and capital of the province of Rimini in the Emilia-Romagna region of Italy.

examples.text: We decided to visit <w>Rimini</w> for our summer holiday because of its famous nightlife.
The sandy beaches of the <w>Rimini</w> coast attract thousands of tourists every year.

senses.sense_definition: A province in the Emilia-Romagna region of Italy.

examples.text: The province of <w>Rimini</w> contains several historic villages located inland from the sea.
Local elections in the province of <w>Rimini</w> are held to determine regional administration.
